title: Sign up for free text messages to get important news and updates on school reopenings in N.J.
body: The topic of  amid the coronavirus pandemic has been one of the biggest throughout the state in recent weeks.The decision affects so many people. But it’s hard to keep up as details change, sometimes minute-by-minute.We’d like to offer you another way to get the most important information you need, when and how you need it.By signing up for our N.J. Schools News text alerts, you’ll get direct access to the latest developments right to your phone, brought to you by NJ.com’s unparalleled team of reporters, visual journalists, editors and more.Our text alerts are free, and because we know your time and attention are valuable, we’ll only send texts when it matters. We’ll help you cut through the informational clutter surrounding this ever-changing story.In times like these, we know you’ll depend on trusted sources for the news and information needed to make the best choices for you and your family’s health and safety.We’re proud to offer you these text alerts as another way to stay informed.
